EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Forget to Register: vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop - Dallas, TX - February 10
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop - Dallas Please join us on Tuesday, February 10 in Dallas, TX when Darrel Ferguson, Senior Performance Manager, will conduct a Pricing and Appraisal Workshop.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for General Managers, Sales Managers, and Buyers.
Workshop Overview: - Ensure that every car in your inventory is priced in the perfect position to achieve maximum exposure to buyers - Know precisely how much more you can ask for a vehicle while maintaining your rank at the head of the pack and maximize your profit potential - Analyze Market Days Supply and know how hot or not a car is in your market - Develop a fast and profitable exit strategy before buying a vehicle - Know exactly what getting out of a vehicle means in terms of your dealership’s profit goals – before you get in.
Location: Dallas/Fort Worth Airport Marriott 8440 Freeport Parkway Irving, TX 75063 (972) 929-8800
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register your attendees by February 3rd. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email.<http://go.vauto.com/Dallas-Workshop-February-10.html>
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Dallas/Fort Worth Airport Marriott, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/dfwap-dallas-fort-worth-airport-marriott/> or call the hotel directly at (972) 929-8800.
We hope to see you there! -vAuto Marketing vAuto, Inc., 1901 S. Meyers Road, Suite 700, Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181
